amendment.description: To authorize $1,000,000 for the phase 1 construction of an air traffic control complex at Minot Air Force base, North Dakota, and to provide an offset.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4407 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4407 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Dorgan. (consideration: CR S6377-6392; text: CR S6389) To authorize $1,000,000 for the phase 1 construction of an air traffic control complex at Minot Air Force base, North Dakota, and to provide an offset.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4407 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4407 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Dorgan.
